description: Manage Collector Policy for Azure Traffic Collector resource.

commands.name: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy create
commands.syntax:
az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy create --collector-policy-name
                                                              --resource-group
                                                              --traffic-collector-name
                                                              [--emission-policies]
                                                              [--ingestion-policy]
                                                              [--location]
                                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--tags]
examples: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy create --resource-group rg1 --traffic-collector-name atc1 --name cp1 --location eastus --ingestion-policy {ingestion-sources:[{resource-id:/subscriptions/<subscription_id>/resourceGroups/<resource_group>/providers/Microsoft.Network/expressRouteCircuits/<cp_name>,source-type:Resource}],ingestion-type:IPFIX}

commands.name: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy delete
commands.syntax:
az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy delete [--collector-policy-name]
                                                              [--ids]
                                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--resource-group]
                                                              [--subscription]
                                                              [--traffic-collector-name]
                                                              [--yes]
examples: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy delete --resource-group rg1 --traffic-collector-name atc1 --name cp1

commands.name: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy list
examples: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy list --resource-group rg1 --traffic-collector-name atc1

commands.name: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy show
examples: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy show --resource-group rg1 --traffic-collector-name atc1 --name cp1

commands.name: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy update
commands.syntax:
az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy update [--add]
                                                              [--collector-policy-name]
                                                              [--emission-policies]
                                                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--ids]
                                                              [--ingestion-policy]
                                                              [--location]
                                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--remove]
                                                              [--resource-group]
                                                              [--set]
                                                              [--subscription]
                                                              [--tags]
                                                              [--traffic-collector-name]
examples: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy update --resource-group rg1 --traffic-collector-name atc1 --name cp1 --location eastus --emission-policies [0]={emission-destinations:[{destination-type:AzureMonitor}],emission-type:IPFIX}

commands.name: az network-function traffic-collector collector-policy wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
